name: pp-rut
description: Validate the Chilean R.U.T. and its verification digit

scripts.build: rollup -c && terser -o ./dist/pp-rut.nd.min.js  --compress --mangle --comments false -- ./dist/pp-rut.nd.rollup.js && terser -o ./dist/pp-rut.min.js  --compress --mangle --comments false -- ./dist/pp-rut.rollup.js && cp ./dist/pp-rut.nd.min.js ./www

author: Carlos Illesca
